channel.description: Recent content in git on kslee5838

item.title: git command (1)
item.description: 1. How to publish You create Rmarkdown on Rstudio, suppose title is “myblogg”, then do below for publishing. $git status $git add . $git rm --cached myblogg $git commit -m "~~~" $git push 2.Snippets $git diff HEAD $git log $git log --graph $git branch $git checkout netlify-deploy $git checkout master $git merge --no-f netlify-deploy 3.Others $git remote add origin kslee5838@github.com…..: —– $git remote -v $git branch -a #로컬repository와 원격repository 내용을 확인할 수 있음
